trans-unit.source: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Especifica informações sobre como um documento está impresso, incluindo a impressora que imprime-, ao imprimir a partir de uma aplicação do Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you access a PrinterSettings through <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to modify printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, acede a um PrinterSettings através de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades para modificar as definições de impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The most common printer setting is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, which specifies the printer to print to.
trans-unit.target: A definição de impressora mais comuns é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, que especifica a impressora de impressão para.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre a impressão do Windows Forms, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Descrição geral do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender imprimir a partir de uma aplicação do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing>espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor predefinido inicializa todos os campos para os respetivos valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to set settings for the printer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, não criar uma instância de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, mas em vez disso, utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ao configurar definições para a impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a impressora suporta dois lados impressão.

trans-unit.source: To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> to one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> values.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar duplex de impressão e se a suportar a impressora, defina <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex>valores.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer supports double-sided printing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a impressora suporta dois lados impressão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o documento impressos está agrupado.

trans-unit.source: Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Collating é executado apenas quando o número de cópias maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to specify the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Defina a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>propriedade para especificar o número de cópias a imprimir</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting Collate to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: Definição Collate `true` irá imprimir uma cópia completa do documento antes da primeira página do seguinte de cópia está impresso.

trans-unit.source: `false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.
trans-unit.target: `false`irá imprimir cada página pelo número de cópias especificado antes de impressão através da página seguinte.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printed document is collated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o documento impressos está agrupado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de cópias do documento para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.
trans-unit.target: Nem todas as impressoras suportam impressão copes vários.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>propriedade para determinar o número máximo de copia o suporta de impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se o número de cópias está definido ou superior as cópias máximas suportadas da impressora, serão impressos apenas o número máximo de cópias e sem exceção irá ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Algumas impressoras podem não suportar a impressão mais de uma cópia de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: O número de cópias para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Copies property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor de cópias a propriedade é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information that is useful when creating a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora que é útil ao criar um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the CreateMeasurementGraphics method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o método CreateMeasurementGraphics, pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a impressora sem criar uma tarefa de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para decisões sobre como ao esquema elementos visuais como tipos de letra, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de uma tarefa de impressão complexa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains information from a printer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações a partir de uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora com o nome no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>propriedade não existe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information, optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora, opcionalmente, especificando a origem nas margens.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>método, pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a impressora sem criar uma tarefa de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para decisões sobre como ao esquema elementos visuais como tipos de letra, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de uma tarefa de impressão complexa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar a origem nas margens; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora a partir de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information associated with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora associadas especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>método, pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a impressora sem criar uma tarefa de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para decisões sobre como ao esquema elementos visuais como tipos de letra, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de uma tarefa de impressão complexa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a graphics object for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> para obter um objeto de gráficos para.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora a partir de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> associated with the specified page settings and optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> associado com as definições de página especificada e, opcionalmente, especificando a origem nas margens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method allows you to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>método permite-lhe obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a impressora sem criar uma tarefa de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para decisões sobre como ao esquema elementos visuais como tipos de letra, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de uma tarefa de impressão complexa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> para obter um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> do objeto para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar a origem nas margens; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que contém informações de impressora a partir de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a predefinição página as definições para esta impressora.

trans-unit.source: Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color.
trans-unit.target: Definições de páginas incluem o tamanho das margens na página, o tamanho do papel para utilizar e, se a cor de impressão.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page settings, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as definições de página, consulte a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that represents the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> que representa as definições de página predefinida para esta impressora.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a definição de impressora para impressão dois lados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> property to check to see if the printer supports duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>propriedade para verificar se a impressora suporta impressão duplex.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é determinada pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Duplex property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Duplex não é um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de página da primeira página a imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O FromPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>propriedades são utilizadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando o utilizador seleciona um intervalo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true` para permitir que o utilizador especifique um intervalo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the FromPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>requer o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>ser especificado e o valor de FromPage ser dentro desse intervalo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, ver o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>para determinar o que deve ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilize o FromPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>Propriedades para determinar que páginas devem ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, em seguida, especifique saída apenas para as páginas selecionadas.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FromPage, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O FromPage <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>também podem ser definidas através de programação, embora o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementação é o mesmo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: O número de página da primeira página a imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage property's value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: FromPage valor da propriedade é inferior a zero.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador um <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura que corresponde às definições de impressora.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`as estruturas são específico do dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copiar uma `DEVMODE` estrutura a partir de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para uma impressora diferentes não é suportada.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver terminado com o identificador que é criado através deste método, tem desalocá-lo por si ao chamar o nativo Win32 `GlobalFree` método.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the GetHdevmode method.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar este método, passa como um parâmetro de valor de retorno do método GetHdevmode.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador um <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora com o nome no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>propriedade não existe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível obter as informações de inicialização da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer and the page settings specified through the pageSettings parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador um estrutura que corresponde a impressora e as definições de páginas especificadas através de pageSettings parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`as estruturas são específico do dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copiar uma `DEVMODE` estrutura a partir de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para uma impressora diferentes não é suportada.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver terminado com o identificador que é criado através deste método, tem desalocá-lo por si ao chamar o nativo Win32 `GlobalFree` método.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar este método, passa como um parâmetro de valor de retorno do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a impressora é um plotter.

trans-unit.source: A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based.
trans-unit.target: Um plotter é uma impressora, por oposição baseado em quadrícula baseado vetor.

trans-unit.source: Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das impressoras baseado no vetor utilizam pens desenho individuais para produzir resultados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer is a plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the printer is a raster.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a impressora for um plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a impressora for uma quadrícula.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>propriedade designa uma impressora válida.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ao obter ou definir algumas propriedades, não é necessária uma impressora válida caso contrário, é gerada uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To avoid exceptions, use the IsValid property after setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> to safely determine if the printer is valid.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar exceções, utilize a propriedade IsValid após a definição de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>em segurança determinar se a impressora é válida.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>propriedade designa uma impressora válida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ângulo, em graus, que a orientação de vertical roda para produzir a orientação de horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de rotação válidos são 90 e 270 graus.

trans-unit.source: If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Se não for suportado horizontal, o valor de rotação só é válido é 0 graus.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true` para imprimir uma página no formato horizontal.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo em graus, que a orientação de vertical roda para produzir a orientação de horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número máximo de cópias a impressora permite que o utilizador imprimir de cada vez.

trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade MaximumCopies para determinar se a impressora suporta impressão várias cópias de cada vez, porque algumas impressoras não.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.

trans-unit.target: Normalmente, pode definir a origem de documento de uma página através de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>disponível através da coleção de PaperSources.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de ficheiro ao imprimir para um ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: The file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: O nome de ficheiro, ao imprimir para um ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page numbers that the user has specified to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os números de página que o utilizador especificado para ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: The PrintRange property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade PrintRange é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando o utilizador seleciona um intervalo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The default PrintRange is `AllPages`.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é PrintRange `AllPages`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que o utilizador especificar um intervalo de páginas para imprimir, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que o utilizador especificar as páginas selecionadas para imprimir, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the PrintRange to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, vista PrintRange para determinar o que deve ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se for PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>Propriedades para determinar que páginas devem ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se for PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, em seguida, especifique saída apenas para as páginas selecionadas.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and PrintRange can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>e PrintRange também pode ser definida através de programação, embora o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementação é o mesmo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The value of the PrintRange property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade PrintRange não é um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printing output is sent to a file instead of a port.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o resultado de impressão é enviado para um ficheiro em vez de uma porta.

trans-unit.source: The PrintToFile property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects the **Print to file** option.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade PrintToFile é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando o utilizador seleciona o **imprimir para ficheiro** opção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, a porta de saída é definida como "Ficheiro", fazendo com que o subsistema de impressão do Windows solicitar ao utilizador para um ficheiro nome quando a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PrintToFile property is only used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and cannot be set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > PrintToFile a propriedade só é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>e não pode ser definido através de programação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The `Print to file` option only appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O `Print to file` opção só é apresentada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o resultado de impressão é enviado para um ficheiro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes sem o processador indicado e para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific and copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`as estruturas são específicas do dispositivo e a copiar um `DEVMODE` estrutura a partir de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>para uma impressora diferentes não é suportada.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador um Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de impressora não é válido.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes sem o processador indicado e para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador um Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de impressora é inválido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta impressora suporta a impressão de cor.

trans-unit.source: To print using color, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Imprimir a cor a utilizar e, se a suportar a impressora, defina <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this printer supports color; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta impressora suporta cor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número da última página para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>e ToPage propriedades são utilizadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando o utilizador seleciona um intervalo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true` para permitir que o utilizador especifique um intervalo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> also requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the ToPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>também requer o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>ser especificado e o valor de ToPage ser dentro desse intervalo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, ver o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>para determinar o que deve ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>e propriedades de ToPage para determinar que páginas devem ser impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, em seguida, especifique saída apenas para as páginas selecionadas.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>também podem ser definidas através de programação, embora o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementação é o mesmo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: O número da última página para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ToPage property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor do ToPage propriedade é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> in string form.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> no formato de cadeia.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia.
